import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Contact() { const [user, setuser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", contact:"", subject: "", message: "" }) const getUserData =(e) => { const name=e.target.name; const value=e.target.value; setuser({...user, [name]: value}) } return (

Send Message

CONTACT US

) }
